typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Movie as string,
		Title as string,
		Genres as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{rotton tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
